title: Sleep log
description: Each entry records one sleep episode that can be the main sleep event at night or an afternoon nap.

in_bed_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date of start of sleep episode.

in_bed_timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time of start of sleep episode

out_of_bed_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date of end of sleep episode.

out_of_bed_timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time of end of sleep episode.

sleep_minutes_total.description: the total amount of time, in minutes, spent asleep during sleep episode.

light_sleep_percentage.description: the percentage of total sleep time that was spent in light (REM) sleep during sleep episode.

deep_sleep_percentage.description: the percentage of total sleep time that was spent in deep (NREM) sleep during sleep episode.

awakening_count.description: the number of times a person awoke from sleep after onset and before final awakening in sleep episode.

awakening_minutes_total.description: total time in minutes that a person remained awake after sleep onset and before final awakening in sleep episode.

slept well.description: Commentary regarding the quality of sleep in sleep episode.

easy_wakeup.description: Commentary regaring the ease in which person awoke at end of sleep episode.
